<uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=planetjones</uri>; </author>; <content type= "html">;<img src="https://static.planetjones.net/the-rough-guide/the-rough-guide-to-the-internet-book.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 242px;" />;<br />;The author takes a trip down memory lane to reflect on the state of the internet and World Wide Web in 1996, as described in the pocket-sized book The Rough Guide 2.0. The book covers topics such as internet speed, devices, social media, e-commerce, online advertising, and communication methods, providing a glimpse into the early days of the internet. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-trip-to-the-internet-in-1996-with-the-rough-guide-2-0" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36280393" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Powers of a 2Ã—2 matrix in closed form</stitle>; <id>;https://www.johndcook.com/blog/2023/06/03/matrix-powers/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T11:03:19.916027Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.johndcook.com/blog/2023/06/03/matrix-powers/"/>; <author>; <name>;KqAmJQ7</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=KqAmJQ7</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.johndcook.com/jdc_20170630.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;The powers of a 2x2 matrix have a simple closed form, with the derivation only taking up one page. The eigenvalues of a 2x2 matrix can be found using a jingle and can sometimes result in surprisingly simple values. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#powers-of-a-2x2-matrix-in-closed-form" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36280055" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Searchable and sortable H1B salary database</stitle>; <id>;https://jobsort.com/h1b</id>; <updated>;2023-06-11T04:03:19.916595Z</updated>; <link href="https://jobsort.com/h1b"/>; <author>; <name>;jobsort</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jobsort</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;The H1B data has been filtered to only include software engineering, bio-medical, managing and chief executives. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#searchable-and-sortable-h1b-salary-database" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36277706" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
